roleset.name: come up with ideas
roleset.note: BRAINSTORM-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3; nominal 'brainstorming' based on BOLT-7. Framed by Claire. (from brainstorm.01-v)
BRAINSTORMING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from brainstorming.01-n)

example.name: brainstorm-v: arg1
example.text: There was never anything about a plan, just brainstorming ways to be more flamboyant.

example.name: brainstorming-n
example.text: As an aid for his brainstorming about causes and effects, Kurt created the following Cause-. Effect Map on forgetting to put out the trash on time.
